```{r}
ceodata <- read.csv('ceo.csv')
salary <- ceodata$salary
plot(salary)
```

1.a)
```{r}
mean(salary)
```
```{r}
median(salary)
```

```{r}
mean.default(salary, trim=0.1)
```

```{r}
quantile(salary, c(0.25, 0.75))
```


```{r}
quantile(salary, c(0.1,0.9))
```

1.b
```{r}
Fn <- ecdf(salary)
Fn(1000)
```
```{r}
plot(Fn)
Fn(1000)
1 - Fn(5000)
quantile(salary, c(0.2))
quantile(salary, c(0.8))
```

```{r}
hist(salary)
```
```{r}
hist(salary, breaks = 30)
```
```{r}
hist(salary, breaks = 3)
```

```{r}
boxplot(salary)
```

```{r}
hist(log(salary))
mean(log(salary))
median(log(salary))
```
